      About Us



      Ardoch House Boutique Hotel is peacefully situated on both the West Highland Way and John Muir Way. It is the ideal location from which to visit Glasgow, Edinburgh, Stirling and Loch Lomond and The Trossachs.

      This Victorian-designed hotel with 3 acres of mature gardens ideally located for keen walkers, being very close to the West Highland, and John Muir Way

      Boutique Hotel, Glamping & Camping and 7 Day Car Parking. Located just North of the Milngavie West Highland Way starting point.

      You can camp here and park your car for the week in a secure location.

      Dog Freindly
